body:
The black two are xterm.

- RUST_BACKTRACE=1 alacritty

issue.title: Failed to open fallback input method: ContextCreationFailed(Null)

repository.name: winit
repository.description: Window handling library in pure Rust

issue.body:
### What happens
Restart fcitx5 cause Alacritty close.
### What should happen
Alacritty should not be closed.
### System
OS: Debian GNU/Linux bookworm/sid x86_64
Version: winit-0.27.3
Alacritty Version: alacritty 0.12.0-dev (e9ee8dc)
 cargo build with only X11 support
Display server: X11
Compositor: picom
WM: dwm
### How to reproduce the issue
I can post it again if needed, but probably not necessary.
https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/issues/6370#issuecomment-1264634153

body: I think that it's not a new bug? The code that crashing is due to the error from the XIM, I personally can't repro that by killing and reenabling XIM, so it's something about your setup? No matter what I do it doesn't crash for me when I force kill or reload fcitx. The crash that you've triggered is due to error during closing the input method...
Does the crash happens with `v0.10.1` at least? I'd assume so, since the failure that we can't open any input method...

> Does the crash happens with `v0.10.1` at least? I'd assume so, since the failure that we can't open any input method...

I tested `v0.10.1` and that stable version doesn't have this problem.
`v0.12.0-dev` (d721424) still has this problem.

alacritty 0.11.0-dev (7d708d53)
This problem does not exist.

This problem has appeared since 5bbba69.
After bump winit to 0.27.3.

@lolicon0930 Could you test this

```diff
diff --git a/Cargo.toml b/Cargo.toml
index aad21557..8964e156 100644
--- a/Cargo.toml
+++ b/Cargo.toml
@@ -10,3 +10,6 @@ members = [
 lto = true
 debug = 1
 incremental = false
+
+[patch.crates-io]
+winit = { git = "https://github.com/kchibisov/winit", branch = "ime-test" }

```

It should also dump styles during reload so please post them as well and try to mark somehow the ones you've got on reload.

alacritty 0.12.0-dev (d7214248)

`$ alacritty &>log`
```
==========================
404
402
408
204

==========================

==========================
thread 'main' panicked at 'Failed to open fallback input method: ContextCreationFailed(Null)', /home/lolicon/.cargo/git/checkouts/winit-4b1f5e8d108a5ef0/ccddaf0/src/platform_impl/linux/x11/ime/callbacks.rs:186:21
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
```
I've updated the branch, I think it should work now. Run `cargo update -p winit` and rebuild(It shouldn't print anything anymore as an indicator).
Given that fixed hasn't landed yet.

issue.title: On X11, fix IME crashing without available styles

repository.name: winit
repository.description: Window handling library in pure Rust

issue.body:
Fixes #2510.

- [x] Tested on all platforms changed
- [ ] Added an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` if knowledge of this change could be valuable to users
- [ ] Updated documentation to reflect any user-facing changes, including notes of platform-specific behavior
- [ ] Created or updated an example program if it would help users understand this functionality
- [ ] Updated [feature matrix](https://github.com/rust-windowing/winit/blob/master/FEATURES.md), if new features were added or implemented

--

I can't repro the initial issue in the first place though and it doesn't make any sense, but it was bisected to the recent change.
